name.jp: エフェクト強化の巻物
name.vi: Cuộn di chuyển Hiệu ứng Nâng cấp

description.en: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.ar: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.br: Este pergaminho ativa os efeitos de aprimoramento alternativos em uma arma específica. Usar o pergaminho em uma arma que já possui efeitos alternativos, reverte para os efeitos originais.
description.cns: 此卷轴可以在指定武器上启用新版特效效果。在已经具有新版特效效果的武器上使用卷轴将恢复为旧版特效效果。
description.de: Diese Schriftrolle aktiviert alternative Upgrade Effekte auf spezifischen Waffen. Nutzen dieser Schriftrolle auf Waffen, die bereits einen alternativen Upgrade Effekt haben, stellt die originalen Effekte wieder her.
description.fi: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.fil: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.fr: Ce parchemin active les effets alternatifs d'amélioration sur une arme spécifique. Si votre arme possède déjà ces effets alternatifs, ce parchemin lui rendra ses effets originaux.
description.id: Scroll ini memungkinkan efek peningkatan alternatif pada senjata tertentu. Menggunakan scroll pada senjata yang sudah memiliki efek upgrade alternatif kembali ke efek aslinya.
description.it: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.jp: 使用した武器の属性グローエフェクトを新しいタイプへ変更することができます。既に新しいタイプに使用した場合は、従来のグローエフェクトへと戻ります。
description.kr: 이 두루마리는 특정 무기에 대한 대체 업그레이드 효과를 적용합니다. 대체 업그레이드 효과가 이미 있는 무기에 두루마리를 사용하면 원래 효과로 돌아갑니다.
description.nl: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.pl: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.ru: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.sp: Este pergamino activa los efectos de mejora alternativos en un arma específica. Usar el pergamino en un arma que ya tiene efectos de mejora alternativos hace que vuelva a los efectos originales.
description.sw: This scroll enables the alternative upgrade effects on a specific weapon. Using the scroll on a weapon which already has alternative upgrade effects reverts to the original effects.
description.th: เปิดใช้งานเอฟเฟกต์การอัปเกรดทางเลือกในอาวุธเฉพาะ การใช้บนอาวุธที่มีเอฟเฟกต์การอัปเกรดทางเลือกอยู่แล้วจะเปลี่ยนกลับเป็นเอฟเฟกต์ดั้งเดิม
description.tw: 此卷軸可以在武器上使用替代升級效果，若重複使用在有替代升級效果的武器的話，將會回復原始的狀態
description.vi: Cuộn này cho phép các hiệu ứng nâng cấp thay thế trên một vũ khí cụ thể. Sử dụng cuộn trên vũ khí đã có các hiệu ứng nâng cấp thay thế sẽ trở lại các hiệu ứng ban đầu.
